card.title: Lentil
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, if its power is 3 or less, draw a card.
card.flavortext: "Wake up! It's only been 4 seconds!"

card.title: Awesomeness
card.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each word in it's text that has 5 or more letters
card.flavortext: I'm awesome. See! I have trample and deathtouch and lifelink... --King Awesome

card.title: King Awesome
card.text:
If there is one other card on the battlefield with the word awesome in it's name, King Awesome gains trample.
If there are two other cards on the battlefield with the word awesome in it's name, King Awesome gains deathouch
If there are three other cards on the battlefield with the word awesome in it's name, King Awesome gains lifelink
card.flavortext: As the king of awesome, you are not awesome. --King Awesome

card.title: Demon from Hell
card.text:
Flying,First strike,Deathtouch
At the begining of your up keep, lose 3 life
card.flavortext: As the demon rose... Hey! What's with the mana cost!!! -Editor

card.title: Excluded Uncool Drake
card.text:
Flying
protection from non- flying creatures
card.flavortext: As King Awesome gained power, he banished ones that he feared

card.title: The Lord of The Pits
card.text:
Flying, First Strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy target creature you don't control
card.flavortext: Although he was banished, he still fought back

card.title: Awesome Illusion
card.text:
Protection from Instants,Sorceries,Equipments,and Enchantments
Whenever Awesome Illusion is targeted, counter that ability and destroy the permenant that it came from
Awesome Illusion isn't put into the graveyard as a result of a Instant or sorcery
card.flavortext: As a result of one of my failed experiments,I would like to banish them,but they don't want to be banished -King Awesome

card.title: Spike Ball
card.text: Defender,deathtouch
card.flavortext: All Spike Balls are deadly,exept for maybe that one. I want to pet it! -Last words of an Awesome solder

card.title: Darksteel Spike Ball
card.text: Defender,deathtouch, Indestructible
card.flavortext: Bring the spike balls in for banishing. If you can't, destroy them But your awesomeness, that's impossible

card.title: Spike Ball Alchemist
card.text: When Spike Ball Alchemist enters the battlefield, search your library for a Spike Ball, reveal t, and put it in your hand.
card.flavortext: Few were at peace with Spike Ball, but their numbers are made up through thought

card.title: Spike Ball Commander
card.text:
When Spike Ball Commander enters the battlefield,put a 1/1 Spike Ball creature token with defender onto the battlefield under your control.
Other spike balls you control gain first strike and lose defender
card.flavortext: When the humans came into Spike Ball territory, they just avoided the Spike Balls. But the Spike Balls didn't like either decision.

card.title: Spike Ball Soldier
card.text: Other Spike Balls get +1/+1
card.flavortext: The only way to destoy Spike Balls used to be very dangerous.Now even that's impossible.

card.title: Harrin of Ball's Pass
card.text: {T}:target Spike Ball loses deathtouch until end of turn.That creature fights Harrin of Ball's Pass
card.flavortext: Being the only one known to destroy Spike Balls effectivlely, King Awesome hired him after they started growing legs.

card.title: Harrin of Spike Valley
card.text: {T} destroy target green creture {T} All Spike Balls you control lose defender and get +3/+3 until end of turn.
card.flavortext: After fighting them for King Awesome for a year,Harrin learned the wisdom of the Spike Balls

card.title: Spike Valley
card.text:
{T}: Add {W}, {R} or {2} to your mana pool
{T}: Regenerate target Spike Ball
card.flavortext: A place of rest and peace for friends... But something else for intruders

card.title: Death Spike Ball
card.text: Deathtouch
card.flavortext: King Awesome started getting more answers for Spike Balls,Spike balls started getting more answers for King Awesome.

card.title: Spike Ball Archer
card.text: Deathtouch,Defender {T}:Spike Ball Archer does 1 damage to target creature or player

card.title: Giant Mace
card.text: Equiped creature gets +2/+2 and Double Strike
card.flavortext: Wars for Goblins consist of doging.Wars for other creatures consist of swinging. -Harrin

card.title: Harrin's Betrayl
card.text: Do X damage to target creature you don't control. Do X+3 damage to target opponent
card.flavortext: When Harrin quit,the result for all of awesomeness was near fatal

card.title: Scert,Goblin Machanist
card.text: {T}: Return to the battlefield one artifact that used to be on the battlefield
card.flavortext: Scert was the best machanic of his time. Unfortunatly,Lord Awesome feared machines.

card.title: Lord Awesome, Corrupt Judge
card.text: Exile target creature At the Begining of your Upkeep,a random exiled creature exiled by this creature does damage equal to it's power to you
card.flavortext: As he became more powerful,he backstabbed friends. But his evil came with a price, mightmares

card.title: What?!
card.text: input/art/Lentil_art.gif
card.flavortext: Y'know, that is a cool picture of me
